long_desc.thetext:
The data directory of CP2K contains important simulation parameters like basis-sets and pseudo-potentials, which are needed for every calculation. They should be package alongside the application binaries.
Furthermore, CP2K has a file-discovery mechanism for data files. To enable it the installation path of the data directory has to compiled into to the binary. In CP2K 2.6 this is achieved by setting the preprocessor Flag -D__DATA_DIR="\"<path>\"" (mind the double quotation). In CP2K 2.7 (trunk) one can simply set the DATA_DIR variable in the ARCH-file (without double quotation).
The novel CP2K-Calculator for ASE also relies on the file-discovery mechanism.
